sources.title: The Bashful Bachelor
sources.description: Title: The Bashful Bachelor Summary: Lum Edwards is annoyed with his partner in Pine Ridge's Jot-'em-Down general store, Abner Peabody, because Abner has swapped their delivery car for a racehorse. Lum is also too timid to ... Directed by: Malcolm St. Clair Actors: Production Company: Jack Votion Productions Inc. Release Date: 19 March 1942 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Lum Edwards is annoyed with his partner in Pine Ridge's Jot-'em-Down general store, Abner Peabody, because Abner has swapped their delivery car for a racehorse. Lum is also too timid to propose to Geraldine, so he involves Abner in a "rescue" effort which nearly gets both of them killed. They try again, and this time Geraldine is impressed. Lum writes a proposal note, but Abner, by mistake, delivers it to the Widder Abernathy, who has been ready to remarry for years. This puts Lum in a peck of trouble until the sheriff appears with the Widder's long-gone and hiding husband.

sources.title: The Bashful Bachelor (1942) [Comedy]
sources.description:
The Bashful Bachelor is a 1942 American film directed by Malcolm St. Clair. The movie is about Lum Edwards, who's annoyed with his partner in Pine Ridge's Jot-'em-Down general store, Abner Peabody, because Abner has swapped their delivery car for a racehorse. Lum is also too timid to propose to Geraldine, so he involves Abner in a "rescue" effort which nearly gets both of them killed. They try again, and this time Geraldine is impressed. Lum writes a proposal note, but Abner, by mistake, delivers it to the Widder Abernathy, who has been ready to remarry for years. This puts Lum in a peck of trouble until the sheriff appears with the Widder's long-gone and hiding husband.

---

Directed and produced by W. Lee Wilder, written by Myles Wilder, Paul Langton as Frank Parrish, Leslie Denison as Peter Wells, Taru Shimada as Subra, Rollin Moriyana as Leva
and Robert Kino as Inspector Karma.

---

Source: "The Bashful Bachelor" Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.. 23 March 2013. Web. 12 June 2013. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Bashful_Bachelor.

If you like this movie and our channel, please subscribe: https://goo.gl/0qDmXe

sources.title: The Bashful Bachelor
sources.description: The second film in the movie adaptation of Lum and Abner radio program.

sources.title: The Bashful Bachelor (1942) LUM & ABNER
sources.description:
Stars: Chester Lauck, Norris Goff, Zasu Pitts
Director: Malcolm St. Clair


Lum Edwards is annoyed with his partner in Pine Ridge's Jot-'em-Down general store, Abner Peabody, because Abner has swapped their delivery car for a racehorse. Lum is also too timid to propose to Geraldine, so he involves Abner in a "rescue" effort which nearly gets both of them killed. They try again, and this time Geraldine is impressed. Lum writes a proposal note, but Abner, by mistake, delivers it to the Widder Abernathy, who has been ready to remarry for years. This puts Lum in a peck of trouble until the sheriff appears with the Widder's long-gone and hiding husband.

sources.title: The Bashful Bachelor (1942) Lum & Abner | Classic Comedy Full Length Film
sources.description:
LOVE COMES TO PINE RIDGE...but it's spelled L-A-U-G-H-S!...and your old friends LUM and ABNER supply them in the loudest doses you ever took! 
Lum Edwards finds out this General Store partner, Abner Peabody has traded the official general-store delivery car for a racehorse. 

Director: Malcolm St. Clair
Writers: Chester Lauck, Norris Goff 
Stars: Chester Lauck, Norris Goff, Zasu Pitts 
Genres: Classic, Comedy 
Budget: $165,000
